body.subject: Deployment.json created - Epic 28 blocked by quality veto
body.summary: Created deployment.json with deployment strategy, rollback plans, monitoring setup. Status: BLOCKED due to quality veto (implementation.json missing, code not implemented). Deployment stages defined (staging → canary → production), but unblocking requires code implementation and passing quality gates.
key_points: Deployment strategy: staged rollout (staging → canary → production)
Rollback plans: per-task (revert commit), full (revert all commits), partial (revert workstream commits)
Monitoring: 6 Prometheus metrics (god_agent_tasks_total, plan_duration_seconds, veto_total, skill_latency_seconds, memory_retrieval_seconds, intent_routing_seconds), 3 Grafana dashboards, 7 alerts
Dependencies: shared infra (MongoDB, Prometheus, LLM API, RAG pipeline, Telegram bot), internal use cases (no changes)
Deployment readiness checklist: 6 categories (code, tests, quality_gates, infrastructure, observability, rollback)
concerns: Deployment blocked until quality veto is resolved
Requires test_evidence (coverage >= 80%, integration tests, smoke tests)
Requires performance tests (< 150ms memory, < 5s intent, < 30s multi-step)
Requires layer boundary validation in CI
body.action_needed: Coordinate with developer for code implementation per plan.json. After receiving implementation.json and test_evidence, conduct re-review with quality. Deployment can only be unblocked after passing quality gates (release_gate: true).
